data.name: ApproachDesc.Text
data.value:
Be bold: Showcase the uniqueness of your Solution. Highlight the characteristics that may attract partners, clients, or investors.
Try to address these questions as you describe the Solution:
  • Are you highlighting the innovation and unique character?
  • Is Solution related with the problem?
  • Is the Solution actionable, practical?
  • Is the innovation actionable, practical?
  • Is the Solution replicable, scalable?

data.name: AutocompleteMessage.Text
data.value: Choose an existing organization or enter the name of a new one.

data.name: AvailableResourcesDesc.Text
data.value: Please tick all resources that are readily available for the implementation of your Solution, or for the transfer of knowledge. This really enhances the description and shows the effort undertaken to develop resources for scale and replication.

data.name: BeneficiariesDesc.Text
data.value: Identify the end-consumer or beneficiary of your Solution. Beneficiaries can be individuals, organizations or groups.

data.name: BlockAdditionalInformationDesc.Text
data.value: More specific information about the Solution

data.name: BlockBenefitsDesc.Text
data.value: This is the chance to describe qualitatively and quantitatively the impact of your Solution. Emphasize the reach of this impact and how it is sustainable over time.

data.name: BlockDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Describe how your Solution is implemented and provide information about the costs and time needed.

data.name: BlockDurationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: sdf sd ff dsfdsfsdfsd f sdf sdf sdfsdf sdf sdf sdf sdfsd ds fsd

data.name: BlockEvidencesDesc.Text
data.value:
If your Solution has already been piloted, tell us about it.
Remember!
Your Solution will have more opportunities to be seen in NEXSO as much evidences and documentation you present with your Solution.

data.name: BlockFinishDesc.Text
data.value: A peek at how NEXSO presents your Solution before you hit Publish

data.name: BlockInnovationDesc.Text
data.value: This is the key section! Put your marketing skills to work here. Demonstrate how your Solution is innovative and unique. Explain how you made a difference in addressing the problem described.

data.name: BlockOrganizationBasicDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Organization information. Create a new one or search for an existing one.

data.name: BlockProblemDesc.Text
data.value: Describe the problem or market need that your Solution seeks to address. It should be a very specific problem, not a macro global issue like "climate change"or "poverty".

data.name: ChallengeDesc.Text
data.value:
Try to address these questions as you describe the problem:
  • What is the current situation of the beneficiary or consumer that you try to support with this Solution?
  • What is the context of the problem and the actual situation of the people affected?
  • What obstacle is that beneficiary or consumer facing?
  • What causes this problem you are describing?
  • What is the size or magnitude of this problem? Numbers are welcome.
  • Who are the affected people from this problem?

data.name: chkPublicationApproval.Text
data.value: I accept my Solution to be published in <a href="home.aspx" target="_blank"> nexso.org. </ a>

data.name: chkPublicationApprovalCustom.Text
data.value: I want my Solution to be published on nexso.org after completing the selection process by the Japan Special Fund Poverty Reduction Program (JPO). Only the information posted in my Solution will be published. Information related with the Expression of Interest and its annexes will not be visible to the public.

data.name: ConfirmationDelete.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Solution?

data.name: CostDesc.Text
data.value: In this section you must give an estimated cost for your Solution implementation.

data.name: CostDetailsDesc.Text
data.value:
Use this space to describe additional cost considerations, including the number of units, travel, materials, and so on.Try to separate the fixed and variable costs.
Keep in mind other cost factors including travel, licensing fees, legal work, hosting and other online services for web projects, and materials.

data.name: DeliveryFormatDesc.Text
data.value: Please select the type that best describes how your Solution will be delivered.

data.name: DurationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Use this space to further clarify and describe the duration selection above.

data.name: ImplementationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value:
Briefly describe the main activities and details needed for the implementation of your Solution. This information is very important for the potential partner, investor, or buyer to understand what is required and associate the costs and time needed for the implementation.
Remember that the implementation can be in two types, depending on the maturity level of the Solution:
  • Developed or proof of concept
  • Scale up or replicate of proven and matured Solution
These details will help you justify the estimated costs and duration of the implementation of the Solution.

data.name: LocationDesc.Text
data.value: Indicate the countries where you have piloted your Solution. Select all those that apply. If you add an incorrect country delete by clicking on the “X”at the country box.

data.name: LongDescriptionDesc.Text
data.value:
Here's an extra opportunity for you to pitch your Solution!
Use this additional space to share any additional information you have about your Solution. Get into more details here, or elaborate on a particular area. You might use this section to add more history of your Solution or to demonstrate credentials relevant to potential adopters. Please do not repeat yourself here.

data.name: MailTemplateNewSolution.Text
data.value:
{SOLUTION:Title}
Congratulations, {USER:FirstName}. We see you started a new Solution on NEXSO. Here's a short guide to show you everything you need to complete in order to see you Solution published.
Everything You Need To Get Published
1. Start Here
The title, the tagline, the organization
2. Problem
Describe the particular development problem that your Solution seeks to alleviate.
3. Innovation
Demonstrate how your Solution is innovative, how it makes a difference, and how it addresses the specific challenge you described.
4. Impact
Explain the results and effects a potential Solution adopter (a project designer) can expect from implementing your Solution.
5. Details
Any specific points of interest someone would need to know about implementation in order to evaluate the Solution and its replication potential.
6. Evidence
More information that can convince potential adopters to connect with your Solution.
7. Finish
Publish your Solution
Edit your Solution
For further support on how to publish a Solution please visit our help page.
Forgot your password? Reset.
Inter-American Development Bank
Multilateral Investment Fund
1300 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 205577, USA

data.name: MailTemplateNewSolutionSubject.Text
data.value: {USER:FirstName} Make sure you turn your draft into a submitted Solution!

data.name: MailTemplatePublishedSolution.Text
data.value:
Your Solution is published!
Congratulations on transforming your innovation into an easy-to-read 500-word Solution! Succinct Solutions like these can be reviewed more quickly and spread more effectively, and hopefully... no more long proposal writing for you.
NEXSO is a community of 1500+ members in 29 countries, creating the premier marketplace of development Solutions to improve life in Latin America and the Caribbean.
View my Solution
Keep working on your Solution
All published Solutions on NEXSO are under constant review for matches with funding opportunities. Regularly updating your Solution is important for maintaining its visibility on NEXSO for potential funding opportunities.
View featured Solutions »
Join a challenge
More than 5 million dollars in prizes and funding opportunities has been distributed to Solution providers just like you, through NEXSO Challenges. Limited duration, themed challenges provide eligible community members with exclusive opportunities that can help to gear your Solution for growth.
All current and past challenges are listed on the homepage, and we'll be sure to let you know when a new challenge is getting ready to launch.
Forgot your password? Reset.
Inter-American Development Bank
Multilateral Investment Fund
1300 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 205577, USA

data.name: MailTemplatePublishedSolutionSubject.Text
data.value: {USER:FirstName}, Congratulations Your Solution is now eligible to participate in NEXSO opportunities!

data.name: MaxLengthExceeded.Text
data.value: You have exceeded the maximum characters.

data.name: OrganizationAttachedDesc.Text
data.value: Select an Organization from the List or Type an Organization Name for creating a new one.

data.name: ProjectDurationDesc.Text
data.value: Indicate how long it takes to implement your Solution.

data.name: ResultsDesc.Text
data.value:
Try to answer these questions as you describe the impact of your Solution:
  • How do you quantify (using numbers) the impact of your Solution?
  • What is the potential scale or dimension of your Solution?
  • What is your business model? Briefly explain how your Solution can generate income and be sustainable.
  • Have you included figures to support the impact description and show evidence of the success of your Solution?

data.name: revtxtCost.Text
data.value: Please type an integer or decimal type number. Ex: 1,352,365.36 or 1352365.36

data.name: rfvRadAutoCompleteBox1.Text
data.value: Please select or type an organization

data.name: rfvtxtAvailableResources.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 resources. You must select at least one

data.name: rfvtxtBeneficiaries.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 beneficiaries. You must select at least one

data.name: rfvtxtDeliveryFormat.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 types of Solution. You must select at least one.

data.name: rfvtxtTheme.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 themes. You must select at least one

data.name: ShortDescriptionDesc.Text
data.value: Pitch your Solution in a few words. Use this space to entice people to read more. Single, clear, compelling message that stated why you are different and worth getting attention. You don’t need to repeat the Solution name as these two items will always be shown together. Example: (Solution Name) Sport Trains Youth; (Value Proposition) A workforce development program wrapped inside a soccer ball. We use the best of sport to help youth develop market-driven job skills.

data.name: Step0ShortMessage.Text
data.value: All Solutions must have a name & an organization

data.name: Step3ShortMessage.Text
data.value: Every Solution benefits to some one.

data.name: Step4ShortMessage.Text
data.value: Add useful tags to your Solution

data.name: SubmissionTitleDesc.Text
data.value: A great name is short, crisp, and easily understood. Try limiting the name to 8 words or less. Make your Solution stand out with a memorable name.

data.name: SupportDocumentsDesc.Text
data.value: Upload documents, such as images, business plans, certifications, that may offer additional evidence of your Solution’s effectiveness.

data.name: TermsAcceptMessage.Text
data.value: I understand that in order to have my submission listed in NEXSO I must meet the Submission Guidelines and I must meet eligibility requirements.

data.name: ThemeDesc.Text
data.value: Please select the development theme(s) that can best be used to classify the problem.

data.name: Verification.Text
data.value: Thank you for verifying your account. You may now proceed to make a submmision.

data.name: lblMessage.Text
data.value:
Sorry, you're too late.

This challenge is now closed.

data.name: lbHeader.Text
data.value:
Thank you!

You have been automatically entered into the current NEXSO challenge. 

We will be in touch if your entry is selected by our judging panel.
